title: #100 - Hotline Edition: How Do I Stop Wasting Makeup?
description:
This week, Agape Match’s Online Dating Manager, Erika Ettin, is joining Maria for the Ask a Matchmaker Hotline to answer your questions. If you want to be part of the next tech support, click the link below!Erika Ettin is an online dating expert and dating coach who helps people navigate the world of online dating. Her expertise includes profile creation, photo selection and photography, message writing, and date planning. She is also the author of the book Love at First Site: Tips & Tales for Online Dating Success from a Modern-Day Matchmaker and the co-host of the popular dating podcast “So, We Met Online…”Questions this week include:

  • Since the pandemic, I have been in a wheelchair and on crutches as I learn how to walk again. How do I talk about this on the dating apps?
  • What kind of screening process should I have before agreeing to a date with someone?
  • He loves to text me all day. I am really busy and not comfortable with it. How do I tell him?
  • I’m studying to become a Rabbi. It feels like a grind being on the apps. What should I do?
To join the next Online Dating Tech Support on Monday June 13th at 12PM, visit: https://agapematch.wufoo.com/forms/z1s18kn10qpwm8f/Maria is going to Tulum! Join her at the next Agape Intensive In Real Life by registering at agapeescapes.com.Want to do an Agape Intensive virtual program instead? AgapeIntensive.comTo book a private dating strategy call with a member of Maria's team, visit https://calendly.com/felix-louie. Follow Erika at @alittlenudgeFollow Maria at @matchmakermaria See you next week!
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
